Geospatial ML & Tools

Biomass Estimation with DL
ResNet and EfficientNet ensemble for estimating above-ground biomass using Sentinel-2.

Soil Organic Carbon Prediction
Random forest and boosting models using EO predictors from EU and India.

Impervious Surface Classifier
CNN model to classify built-up areas from Sentinel-2 imagery.

Compare Spectra App
Interactive Earth Engine tool to compare reflectance across landcover types.

Urbanisation ML Pipeline
GEE pipeline to predict and map urban expansion in Delhi.

Gaza Damage Portal
Map app visualizing building-level SAR-based damage.

Rhine Flood Monitor
GEE-based dashboard for monitoring water extent and flood change.

Data Science Workshop Slides
R-based data workflows and slides from my teaching sessions.

Spatial Visualization Gallery
Raster + vector layouts from civic mapping and EO work.
